section.p: Just had to get this off to you before you buy tickets for that one-man show I was talking about last week. We went to see it at the new theatre last night. It was a really odd production actually. There were about twenty musicians and only one actor and we really weren't impressed with either the show or the theatre.

We'd booked our seats over the telephone but we didn't get the ones we'd asked for. We'd wanted seats up in the but we were in the front of the stalls, right behind the , who played far too loudly. Also, I couldn't see half the time because the 's head kept getting in the way and the was packed so we couldn't move anywhere else.

It was pretty boring too, watching one actor walking around the for nearly two hours, there were no really either. He just wore a pair of black trousers and polo-neck sweater. He used only one too - a camera. I was really relieved when the finally came down and we could go home.
So, anyway, if I were you, I'd definitely give it a miss.
I'm afraid I have to dash now - will write later if I have time.
